name: remote
description: OpenCode Vibe Kanban - AI Agent orchestration platform

scripts.dev: concurrently -n ts,rust,client -c blue,yellow,green "pnpm run dev:ts" "pnpm run dev:rust" "pnpm run dev:client"
scripts.dev:app: concurrently -n rust,client -c yellow,green "pnpm run run:rust" "pnpm run run:client"
scripts.dev:local: concurrently -n rust,client,gateway -c yellow,green,magenta "pnpm run run:rust" "pnpm run run:client" "pnpm run dev:gateway:local"
scripts.build: pnpm run build:rust && pnpm run build:ts
scripts.test: pnpm run test:scripts && pnpm run test:ts && pnpm run test:rust
